definitions.definition: A state of the bowels in which the evacuations are infrequent and difficult, or the intestines become filled with hardened faeces .
The act of crowding anything into a lesser space, or the state of being crowded or pressed together; condensation .

main_definition: A state of the bowels in which the evacuations are infrequent and difficult, or the intestines become filled with hardened faeces .
secondary_definitions: The act of crowding anything into a lesser space, or the state of being crowded or pressed together; condensation .
